Table of Contents for current page

Receptor Binding ​

To understand how mutations affect binding to soluble receptor, we performed selections on our pseudovirus libraries with soluble receptor. Neutralization of pseudovirus variants serves as a proxy for receptor binding. Receptor binding selections were fit with polyclonal.
